divs: sighting detailsi was parking my car when i saw 3 orange\red lights traveling slowly across the downtown detroit skyline, thought they were a type of star, sometimes flickering. plane flight paths are usually more to the northwest of our high rise apt. blgs. i noticed one sitting near a star, but it was much too bright and reddish orange in color (like a flame). i was parking my car and suddenly stopped to get out. this light then was followed by 2 more similar lights traveling at the same slow speed as a plane would be but about the same distance apart. the first 2 objects passed over me out of sight then the 3rd flickered out and it was a clear night. they were traveling in westerly direction away from canada and the detroit river. as soon as i watched the 3rd flicker out and extinguish, i then looked back to the direction where they came from and there were 4 more like out of no where, i also watched them until they passed over head and became obscured by the other apt. blg. that is adjacent to mine. a helicopter then appeared to the west of me shining a light in search of someone, but it was flying much lower than the other 7 objects had been. the other objects could have been mistaken for a glowing red star if they weren't moving and they were other diffuse colors or lights around them, but it was indistinguishable to my eyes. i know what the average commercial air carrier looks like in the flight paths near my home. #5) i am always curious when i see ufos and will stop to investigate if i have time, often looking at the sky when im driving. also, i periodically see ufos (strange lights moving) when i look out of my apt window and i also see many planes.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around April 27th 2013
Summary: i saw 3 orange/red light traveling slowly across the dowtown Detroit skyline, thought they were a type of star, sometimes flickering. plane flight paths are usually more to the northwest. 2 past overhead and from my view, the 3rd just flickered out.
